title: VIISHOW Women's Long Sleeve Loose Plain Maxi Dresses Casual Long Dresses with Pockets
description: Material:95% Rayon,5% Spandex,Note 1:The WHITE color is a little bit see through, pairing a nude,lighter color underwear or a slip with it would be better. Note 2: The Pure "White" dress is a little heavier than the other colors.Note 3: The Floral Print is random,the floral print on each dress may be different,but they are definitely made of same pattern fabric.Please pay attention to the above points before placing an order, thanks!
Fabric:Super soft, stretchy and lightweight,can be easily dress up or dress down.
Features: Round neck,short sleeves,two side pockets,floor length,elastic at waist,not lined,maxi dresses,casual basic style.
